name: wasm-boids
description: Boids simulation using WebAssembly and Vue.js

scripts.build-wasm:dev: emcc  src/wasm/main.cpp src/wasm/entry.cpp src/wasm/boid_unit.cpp src/wasm/boids_tree.cpp src/wasm/wasm_bindings.cpp -I D:/GitHub/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows/include -o src/wasm/build/wasm_boids.js -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=createBoidsModule -s ENVIRONMENT=web,worker -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s USE_PTHREADS=1 -s PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE=4 -Oz -gsource-map -s ASSERTIONS=2 -s SAFE_HEAP=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=ccall,cwrap,HEAPF32 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_malloc,_free --bind
scripts.build-wasm:prod: emcc src/wasm/main.cpp src/wasm/entry.cpp src/wasm/boid_unit.cpp src/wasm/boids_tree.cpp src/wasm/wasm_bindings.cpp -o src/wasm/build/wasm_boids.js -I D:/GitHub/vcpkg/installed/x64-windows/include  -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=createBoidsModule -s ENVIRONMENT=web,worker -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -Oz -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=ccall,cwrap,HEAPF32 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_malloc,_free --bind
scripts.serve: concurrently "nodemon --watch src/wasm --ext cpp,h --exec \"npm run build-wasm:dev\"" "wait-on src/wasm/build/wasm_boids.js && vue-cli-service serve"
